job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:   Four-year college degree in Information Technology, Information Security, related field or equivalent work experience  Experience with SQL Server: Stored procedures, Server Replication, Transactional Replication  Five years of experience in a large enterprise in an engineering or delivery role  Experience with Azure: Azure Service Fabric, Azure Functions, Service Bus, Azure Storage services like Cosmos  Experience in one of these languages: C, C#, .NET Technologies, JavaScript, Typescript  Five years of experience working with scripting languages and other automation tools, e.g., PowerShell, etc.  Excellent analytical ability and communications skills  Interpersonal relationship skills  Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously

company.name: ATD Technology, LLC., a full-service Staffing & Recruiting Agency
